text: [Chapter 25b] [Sector 4, Shadow Realm Research Center]

speaker: left
text: It seems you vermin have managed to make it to the fourth sector.

speaker: left
text: Good thing it'll be your last.

speaker: left
text: Erghhh...

speaker: left
text: This isn't looking too good...
[Break flees from the lab]
[Proton opens a door and a loud alarm sounds]

speaker: left
text: ...what was that?
???: Hello

speaker: left
text: Who are you?
???: I am Cayenne, a mechanical created by Death Pepper.

speaker: right
text: Death Pepper, the leader of this lab, awaits in the next sector.

speaker: right
text: But do not worry, I am not your enemy.

speaker: right
text: I can assist you in your battle against Death Pepper, if you would allow it.
[Recruit Cayenne] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: Understood.
[Cayenne has joined your party]
[Everyone stands in front of the enterance of the fifth sector]

speaker: left
text: Soon, the Itucher will be ours.

speaker: left
text: It's time to finally end this.

speaker: left
text: The final sector... that sounds a little intimidating...

speaker: left
text: Bruh...

speaker: left
text: It's time for the ultimate damage!

speaker: left
text: I sure didn't think I'd end up here after leaving Sine.

speaker: left
text: Really can't escape fate, can you?

speaker: left
text: So much for a solo mission.

speaker: left
text: So we're finally here...

speaker: left
text: The Holy Itucher... it's finally within reach...

speaker: left
text: We must bring an end to this destruction.

speaker: left
text: I've spent too much time at sea... but now that I'm here, I might as well help save the world.

speaker: left
text: Ugh, must a noble as I do something like this?

speaker: left
text: It's time to end this lab!

speaker: left
text: We've returned to where it all begun. Now it's time to end it.

speaker: left
text: Argh! Death to the Xuirists!

speaker: left
text: It is time for them to learn what fear feels like.

speaker: left
text: Will this finally end the cycle of destruction?

speaker: left
text: Huh, how did I end up here?

speaker: left
text: Hahahaha! Let's see how they fair against me!

speaker: left
text: After this, we'll finally get revenge for what they've done to Nation!

speaker: left
text: This battle is for Xuirventh, Xuirfth, and all of the the Xuirs that suffered by Death Pepper's rule!

speaker: left
text: It's time to stop 'em!

speaker: left
text: It's been a long journey, but it's finally coming to an end...

speaker: left
text: After all of these years, we're ending this at the very place it started it...

speaker: left
text: For everyone who suffered...

speaker: left
text: For everyone who died...

speaker: left
text: We must win!
[Proton opens the door and everyone charges into the sector]
